Get the benefit of lane departure warning. 10 airbags to protect you and your family. It has a 4.6 litre engine and 285kW of power!. This Stunning New Lexus LS460 2017 has voice recognition. This car has keyless start, driver airbag, woodgrain - dash board, front & rear power windows, bluetooth functionality, power tailgate/boot and hill holder. Collision avoidance system. Inbuilt GPS navigation system. Has blind spot sensors. Rear vision camera so you can easily see what is behind you when reversing. This car has parking assist graphical display. It has storage compartment in centre console. This car has active cornering headlamps, information display, brake assist, digital radio (DAB+), adaptive cruise control, HID headlamps, rear cup holders and premium sound system.
